column3:
$ use_libsecp256k1=1 ./configure --with-secp256k1 CXXFLAGS="-DUSE_SECP256K1 -O2 -g -Isecp256k1/include" --with-gui=no
$ make

works for me to test the compile
See pull https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/5838 for the testsuite fix for\n$ make check\n

Thanks for fixing this up!

Unfortunately, it's not actually intended for use quite yet. Upstream libsecp256k1 hasn't yet given the all-clear, so I think the right thing to do here is to actually remove the temptation until they do. See #5839.
Agree with @theuni. Thanks for doing this but it's not ready yet. Hopefully we can merge this after the BIP66 softfork. Closing in favor of #5839.\n
